activity_differential: vehicles traversing urban tunnel and road
camera vehicle following van through underpass
urban traffic moving through tunnel and onto open road
description: A van is driving through an urban underpass and tunnel, followed by another van, with several cars and a motorcycle appearing as the vehicles progress along a winding road. The camera, mounted inside or on a vehicle, moves forward, following the van and tracking the road as the scene transitions from underpass to open road.
